short_summary: Canteen items on an as-and-when-requested basis
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking bids for the supply of miscellaneous canteen items on an as-and-when-requested basis.
full_summary:
**Title and Description:**
# 21201-248363 RISO Canteen Items
## Public Services and Procurement Canada has a requirement for the supply of miscellaneous canteen items on an as and when requested basis.

**Announcement Details**
* **Refrence Number**: WS4307966084
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4307966084
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Tender Closing Date**: Wednesday, December 15, 2023, at 2:00:00 P.M.
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not applicable
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not applicable
* **Tender Status**: Expired due to lack of response.

**Procurement Details**
* **Category of Procurement**: Goods Desk (GD)
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RISO)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Not applicable
* **Regions of Delivery**: New Brunswick, Nova Scotia

**Contracting Entity Information**
* **Name of Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Point of Contact**
* **Name**: Tara Sheppard (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not applicable
* **Fax**: Not applicable
* **Note**: Please send inquiries via the Ariba messaging tool.

**Requirements**
The successful RISO supplier will be required to supply miscellaneous canteen items on an as and when requested basis for a period of one (1) year. Deliveries will be made to the following institutions: Atlantic Institution, Dorchester Penitentiary, and Springhill Institution. The successful bidder will be evaluated based on the lowest priced compliant bid. All suppliers must be compliant with the requirement, lists of products, and conditions specified in the Request for Standing Offer. 

Please visit the following link for full details: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18091412
